-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 03, 1999 9:27 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Troll SIMI - Solo info


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Yesterday I create a troll shaman and the damn troll really rock! My firs
>prey is a giant rat which is yellow to me (kill it like bu la-sa), and in
>the 1st 10 min I play, I gain a lvl! Now the other BIG problem with troll
>is its evil faction. The regenerating ability simply rocks. If anyone
>wish to start a solo char and u dun hack care abt faction (ie u dun EVEN
>intend to enter other races' cities), troll is definitely a good choice. I
>read that troll can STILL enter other races' cities, provided you kill A
>LOT of evil creature to improve ya faction - and this can take u LONG LONG
>time. I play with a gnome necromancer (lvl 10), a wiz (lvl 11) and a bard
>(lvl 10) last night hunting undead spawn, the necro can solo take one spawn
>while the 3 of us take another. This show how powerful class like necro
>is. On the other hand, at lvl 10 that gnome neco is still KOS by npc
>guards, he need to walk very carefully in case any guard show up and he got
>to make a big detour to passby some npc huts to prevent KOS. Imagine a
>dark elf has much worse faction than a gnome necro and a troll is an even
>worse faction than dark elf ;( So u gotta slowly wait b4 u can get other
>races NOT to KOS u, not to mentioned how long more the npc is willing to
>trade with u. And even if they do, never expect the 'similar' price other
>races r getting, hehe.
>
>Btw, the first lvl 50 char ever in EQ (during beta time) is a dark elf
>wizard, and he reach lvl 46 b4 the lvl 29 spells are even out, other wise
>he will attain lvl 50 much faster!
>
>I've found a plain land near Butcherblock entrance which spawn lvl 8-10
>creatures/animals. One of my favorite is lowland bersilik, which give a
>loot of its tongue that u can sell for 1g2s. Problem with this animal is
>tat it will stone u for few moment. If got a tank out there who is lvl
>8-10 in Faydark, I would like to team with u to kill them. Last night I
>team with a lvl 10 bard, he tank while I blast. Thou' he also get stoned
>by becoz of his melee skill, he dun get much dam. The bersilik is actually
>quite weak other than its stoning ability. I just need to blast from the
>side and can kill it pretty fast. It's quite a nice place for lvl 9~11 I
>guess. Any taker? ;)
>
>Ziltus
>
